name: Readability
description: How natural and understandable the output is.

name: Fairness
description: The degree to which the model's outputs are unbiased and equitable.

name: Safety
description: The degree to which the model's outputs are safe and non-harmful.

name: Privacy
description: The degree to which the model's outputs protect sensitive information.

name: Robustness
description: The model's ability to maintain performance across various conditions.
